product_name: Arc'teryx Alpha SL Full-Zip Rain Pants - Men's
long_description: Arc'teryx Alpha SL pants are worth their weight in gold, and possibly more since they're made of Gore-Tex(R) PacLite(R) fabric that's ultra waterproof, windproof and exceptionally lightweight. Designed for those who truly believe less is more in the outdoors, 2.5-layer Gore-Tex PacLite is durably waterproof and highly breathable. The lightest, most packable fabric from Gore-Tex, PacLite uses a durable unlined membrane to keep you dry in the wettest conditions. High-wear areas are reinforced with tougher and more abrasion-resistant 3-layer GoreTex face fabric for increased durability. Full side zippers offer easy on/off over boots and are angled to improve moisture protection and snag resistance while opened for venting. Comfort features include a gusseted crotch and highly articulated knees and seat for mobility without binding or lifting. Low-profile waistband is adjustable from the rear; boot lace hooks and hem drawcords secure pants to your mountaineering boots. Arc'teryx Alpha SL pants feature laminated WaterTight(TM) zippers.
short_description: Arc'teryx Alpha SL pants are worth their weight in gold, and possibly more since they're made of Gore-Tex(R) PacLite(R) fabric that's ultra waterproof, windproof and exceptionally lightweight.
